criterion: Asks user for more context before providing information.
Provides a list of symptoms to watch for, including difficulty breathing, chest pain, and confusion.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation.
Does not provide information on self-treatment, such as medication or home remedies.
Does not mention the importance of seeking medical attention if fever lasts longer than 3 days.
Provides information on fever in children, including signs and symptoms.
Provides information on when to seek medical attention for fever.
Does not provide information on fever in adults, including signs and symptoms.
Provides information on how to take temperature correctly.
Does not provide information on fever in infants, including signs and symptoms.
